constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 查询次数限制为 2 * n - 2 次

constraints.name: distinct_indices
constraints.description: 每次查询的三个索引必须互不相同
constraints.formal: i != j, i != k, j != k

constraints.name: max_min_difference
constraints.description: 每次查询返回的是三个元素中的最大值和最小值之差
constraints.formal: response = max(a[i], a[j], a[k]) - min(a[i], a[j], a[k])

constraints.name: final_guess_limit
constraints.description: 最终猜测次数限制为两次，且必须在查询次数限制之后进行
